intro: Psychotria aledjoensis, commonly known as the Kassanje psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Psychotria aledjoensis is notable for its potential medicinal properties and ecological significance in its native habitat.
